Ukeneye interineti kugira ngo urebe ko hari amakuru mashya. Kugirango ugenzure ikoranabuhanga rya Wi-Fi, jya ku Magenamiterere > Umuyoboro na interineti > Interineti > Wi-Fi.

Jya ku Magenamiterere > Umuyoboro na interineti> Wi-Fi kugirango ushyireho ku murongo none aha.

Kwinjizaporogaramu byarangiye. Uzahamagarirwa kongera kwatsa terefone yawe (Icyiciro %1$dcya%2$d)
Hari amavugurura y'ingenzi ya sisitemu agenga sisitemu. Hitamo Gushyiramo kugirango wemeze ivugurura. Bitabaye ibyo, iyi vugurura izashyirwa mu bikorwa mu buryo bwikora kuri %1$s.
Hari amavugurura y'ingenzi agenga umutekano. Hitamo Gushyiramo kugirango wemeze ivugurura. Bitabaye ibyo, iyi vugurura izashyirwa mu bikorwa mu buryo bwikora kuri %1$s.
Iri vugurura ry'ingenzi rizajya ryishyiramo kuri %1$s. Reba neza ko ufite batiri ihagije kugira ngo winjize porogaramu.
Kubera ko iyi vugurura ari ingenzi, igikoresho cyawe kizinjizaporogaramu ubwacyo kuri%1$s. Igihe cyo kwinjiza porogaramu: iminota%2$d
Nyamuneka ongera ufungure igikoresho cyawe kugira ngo ushyireho iyi mpinduka y'ingenzi vuba bishoboka. Niba utongeye gufungura wenyine, igikoresho cyawe kizafunguka mu buryo bwikora kuri %1$s.
Kubera ko iyi vugurura ari ingenzi, igikoresho cyawe kizatangira ubwacyo kuri%1$sniba utari warongeye gutangira kugeza icyo gihe.

igikoresho cyawe ntabwo kiri kuri interineti

Gukoresha Wi-Fi birasabwa. Ku dawunirodinga amakuru ukoresheje interineti ya telefoni igendanwa cyangwa gukoresha interineti ya telefoni igendanwa mu gihe uri mu mahanga bishobora gutuma wishyura amafaranga y'inyongera.

Ibyo ugomba kumenya mbere yo ku Dawunirodinga

Ntuzashobora guhamagara cyangwa guhamagarwa, hakubiyemo guhamagara ubutabazi mu gihe cyo kwatsa!

Ntibyashobotse ku Dawunirodinga amavugurura. Gahunda yo kuvugurura ntabwo iboneka muri iki gihe.
Nta kindi gikorwa gikenewe.
Ihangane, habaye ikibazo cyo kuvugurura%1$s yawe. Nta mpinduka zakozwe. Nyamuneka gerageza nanone ujya kuri Igenamiterere> Kuvugurura sisitemu.
Igikoresho ntigishobora kuvugurura ubu kuko guhamagara biri gukorwa
Habayeho gutandukana kwa verisiyo. Hazabaho kongera kuvugurura. Niba iboneka, uzabibwirwa.

Ntibyashobotse gushiramo amavugurura. Verisiyo y'ivugurura ntabwo ihuye na terefone yawe.
Nyamuneka fata verisiyo ikwiriye ya terefone yawe maze wongere ugerageze.
Interineti yakuweho. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze ukoresheje uburyo busanzwe kugenzura ibishya ukoresheje igenamiterere rya Terefone.
Ntabwo twashoboye ku Dawunirodinga iri vugurura. Niba wifuza kubona iri vugurura nyuma, nyamuneka ongera utangize igikoresho cyawe hanyuma ujye kuri Igenamiterere> ivugurura rya sisitemu.

Ntibishoboka gusoza ko Dawunirodinga. Nta mwanya uhagije kuri Memori kadi.

Ivugurura rya porogaramu ririmo gukururwa kuri memori kadi.

Ikosa ryabaye kuri Seriveri. Wongere ugerageze mukanya.

Iri vugurura rikeneye %1$s y'umwanya uboneka ku gikoresho cyawe.
Nyamuneka gusiba porogaramu udakoresha cyangwa kwimurira amafoto yawe na videwo ku kindi gikoresho cyo kubika kugirango ubone umwanya%2$s.
Bimaze gukorwa, urashobora kujya kuri Igenamiterere> ivugurura rya sisitemu kugirango utangire ivugurura igihe icyo aricyo cyose.

Iri vugurura rikeneye %1$s y'umwanya uboneka uriho ubusa ku gikoresho cyawe. Nyamuneka shakisha umwanya w'ububiko kugirango kuvugurura bigende neza
Ugomba gukuraho%1$s umwanya mbere yo kuvugurura. Gerageza gusiba porogaramu udakoresha cyangwa kwimurira amafoto na videwo ku kindi gikoresho cyo kubika.
Ibyahinduwe ntibishobora kwemezwa neza. Ongera ugerageze indi nshuro.
Nyamuneka shyiramo ivugurura naho ubundi igikoresho kizahita gishyiraho mu gutangira bundi bushya bukurikira. Reba neza ko igipimo cya bateri kirenze%s

Iri ni ivugurura ryingenzi, nyamuneka winjizemo porogaramu bitarenze%1$s. Bitabaye ibyo, igikoresho cyawe kizajya cyishyiriraho mu gihe kidakoreshwa cyane. Reba neza ko ufite batiri ihagije kugira yo kwinjizmo porogaramu.
Nyamuneka shyiramo ukoresheje%1$s. Bitabaye ibyo, igikoresho cyawe kizajya cyishyiriraho mu gihe gikoreshwa gake. Igihe cyo kwinjiza porogaramu: iminota%2$d
Nyamuneka ongera watse nyuma %1$s. Bitabaye ibyo, igikoresho cyawe kizajya cyiyatsa mu gihe kidakoreshwa cyane.
Niba utongeye gutangiza%1$s, igikoresho cyawe kizatangira gukora mu gihe kitakoreshejwe cyane.
Igihe cyari cyateganyijwe cyo kwongera kwinjizaporogaramu cyararangiye. Kwinjizaporogaramu bizatangira igihe igikoresho cyawe kizaba cyujuje ibisabwa.
Igihe cyari cyateganyijwe cyo kwongera kwatsa cyararangiye. Igikoresho kizongera gutangira igihe cyujuje ibisabwa.

Kwinjiza porogaramu byahagaritswe kubera batiri nke. Kwinjiza porogaramu birasubukurwa igihe igikoresho cyawe kiraba kwinjije umuriro.
Gukurura kuri murandasi byahagaritswe kubera batiri nke. Gukurura kuri murandasi birasubukurwa igihe igikoresho cyawe kiraba kwinjije umuriro.
Nyamuneka shyiramo umuriro mu gikoresho cyawe byibuze mbere %syo kwinjizamo iyi vugurura
Niba udashyizeho iyi vugurura ya sisitemu vuba, uzatakaza amakuru yingenzi yo mu rwego rw'umutekano, kimwe n'ibintu bishya n'ibikoresho byo gukosora amakosa.
Kubera ko ari amakuru y'ingenzi, turagusaba kongera gutangiza igikoresho. Bitabaye ibyo, uzatakaza amakuru arebana n'umutekano, ndetse n'ibintu bishya n'ibikoresho byo gukosora amakosa.

Icyitonderwa: Ku bw'umutekano wawe, amavugurura yose y'ingenzi y'umutekano azajya adawunirodingwa ashyirwemo mu buryo bwikora byaba bifunze cyangwa bifunguye.
Icyitonderwa: Ku bw'umutekano wawe, amavugurura yose afite ikibazo azajya adawunirodingwa ashyirwemo mu buryo bwikora byaba bifunze cyangwa bifunguye.

Guma mu mutekano hamwe no kuvugurura byikora

Ivugurura ry'ubwenge rifasha igikoresho cyawe gukora neza kandi mumutekano. Iyo ubishyize ku murongo, porogaramu zose z'umutekano nshya n'ibibazo bizajya bikururwa mu buryo bwikora. Nyuma yo ku Dawunirodinga, igikoresho cyawe kizongera gutangira mugihe wahisemo.

Ivugurura ry'ubwenge rifasha igikoresho cyawe gukora neza kandi mumutekano. Iyo ubishyize ku murongo, porogaramu zose z'umutekano nshya zizajya ziskururwa mu buryo bwikora. Nyuma yo ku Dawunirodinga, igikoresho cyawe kizongera gutangira mugihe wahisemo.

Sisitemu yawe iri kuvugurura kuri verisiyo
Uzakenera kuvugurura igikoresho cyawe wenyine igihe porogaramu nshya ibonetse. Fungura amavugurura y'ubwenge kugira ngo iyi mikorere ikorwe mu buryo bwikora. Kanda ukeneye ibindi bisobanuro.
Mubusanzwe, ivugurura ryubwenge rikora hagati ya saa 1 - na saa 3. Urashobora guhindura igihe cyo kuvugurura cyangwa guhagarika kuvugurura by'ubwenge mu miterere. Kanda ukeneye ibindi bisobanuro.
Kanda hano kugira ngo ugenzure imiterere y'ububiko hanyuma ukomeze.
Menya uko Andoroyide nshya imeze. Hari hashize iminsi%1$d hategerejwe amakuru mashya.

Komereza aho! Washoboye gushyiraho Andoroyide%1$s. Noneho witeguye kwishimira Andoroyide nziza, ikora neza kandi ifite umutekano.
Ibintu byose bisa n'aho ari byiza!

Ibikorwa byo kwemeza VAB byagenze neza

Icyo gikoresho cyawe gishobora kuba gifite ibibazo by'umutekano. Kora kuri buto rikurikira kugirango ukomeze kuvugururwa
adb enable-verity
Igikoresho cyawe nticyashoboye kwinjizamo iyi vugurura. Koresha uburyo bugufasha kuvugurura sisitemu kugirango winjizemo porogaramu. Kanda ukeneye andi makuru

Habaye ikibazo cyo kuvugurura igikoresho cyawe. Nta mpinduka zakozwe. Kugirango uvugurure porogaramu yawe, urashobora gukoresha igikoresho Kigufasha mu kuvugurura sisitemu.
Kugirango ushyireho igikoresho Kigufasha mu kuvugurura sisitemu:
1. Koresha umugozi wa USB mu guhuza igikoresho cyawe na mudasobwa yawe 2. Iyo imbonerahamwe ya USB igaragaye ku gikoresho cyawe, hitamo igenamiterere hejuru iburyo 3. Kuva ibyifuzwa kuri USB, hitamo kwinjizaporogaramu 4. Jya kuri mudasobwa yawe maze ushakishe uburyo bwo kwinjizamo porogaramu 5. Genda unyuze muri nyobora
sisitemu igufasha kwinjiza porogaramu izagufasha ku Dawunirodinga no kwinjizamo ivugurura rya software kugikoresho cyawe.
Iyo ushizeho amakuru mashya, birinda igikoresho kandi bigatuma ikora neza kurushaho.
Ari ikibazo mu kuvugurura. Nta mpinduka yabaye.
